Episodes.Title: Treasure Hunt
Episodes.Plot: Sam introduces Sarah and James to his new metal detector, and they get hooked on looking for treasure. Unfortunately, they manage to burst a water pipe in the park while searching for Bella's keys! Meanwhile, Norman's game of 'Knights Of The Round Table' backfires when his saucepan helmet gets stuck on his head. Overall, it's a busy day for Sam and the crew...

Episodes.Title: Sam's Day Off
Episodes.Plot: Sam's popcorn machine is just the ticket for the cinemas, until it suffers from a touch of flumbustication!

Episodes.Title: Thief In Pontypandy
Episodes.Plot: Sam's mislaid his watch, Bella's necklace has disappeared and Dilys' earrings have gone missing! Can Sam solve the mystery?
